recipesJson.name: 3-2-1 Blueberry Jam Pandoro FA
recipesJson.author: Skywxp3d
recipesJson.description:
Looking for more recipes using some of the amazing new FA flavors, I decided to take a whirl at one - blueberry pandoro 
FA blueberry tastes like blueberry jam from a truck stop, super rich flavor I really enjoy 
FA Pandoro - made famous in the Cake Pop recipe, this stuff is next level bakery - I do MTL and have trouble with bakery flavors but this pops! 
FA custard premium - Amazing stuff, if you canâ€™t get your hands on it your missing out big time (especially MTL guys)
